name: Skeleton Bolts: Joakim & the Spirit Jungle
name_original: Skeleton Bolts: Joakim & the Spirit Jungle
description:
Welcome to the jungles of West Wherever!

Joakim Utforskarbyxor is on a quest to find the missing idols of Mari Okasami, but he's also interested in a bit of coin. Help him collect as much as possible whilst avoiding the forest spirits who mean no harm, but are venomous to the touch.

Controls:

A/D - Move left and right

Space - Jump

Left Shift - Interact
